edu.cmu.andrew.areyes.scrabble.core

Class Location

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.andrew.areyes.scrabble.core.Location
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public final class Location
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Class that acts as a struct to contain a given (row, col) coordinate on the scrabble board.
    Author:
    Aaron Reyes
